text: Morgan Deann Ortagus (born July 10, 1982) is an American television commentator, financial analyst, and politician. She was the spokesperson for the United States Department of State from 2019 to 2021 during the first Trump administration. On January 3, 2025, Trump announced that he would hire her to be the deputy special presidential envoy for Middle East peace during his second administration. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ortagus, Morgan: Biography. U.S. State Department.
